Sokół – Miłość zawsze jest (2023)
Polish director Tadeusz Śliwa utilizes bullet time and seamless transitions to tell a story of love in the midst of WWII and the Warsaw Uprising.

videos.title: Tim MacMillan - Ferment (1999)
videos.description: In a quiet city square an old man clutches his chest and falls to the ground, and time stands still. We travel from the square, down streets, through buildings – the human condition unfolds in glimpses of frozen moments.
videos.additional_info:
